EmailTemplate.name: Trestle (General) - 1st Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Trestle (General) - 1st Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Service__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Hope your week is going great! I wanted to follow up on the previous email and see if you had any questions on the requested items. I am happy to help!
Best Regards,
